DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Porcelain-fused IPS e.Max CAD Crowns
DOC.criteria: The subject must least 18 ( age consent ) less 70 time inclusion . The subject healthy compliant good oral hygiene . The subject need least two paired contalateral singletooth full coverage molar restoration maxilla and/or mandible . The subject shall stable occlusal relationship fully restore , fix oppose dentition . Obtained informed consent subject . No apical disorder inflammation abutment teeth , adjacent oppose teeth . Good gingival / periodontal / periapical status restoring , oppose adjacent teeth . Healed situation soft tissue augmentation allow . The subject available 5year term investigation . The subject able give her/his inform consent participate . Alcohol drug abuse note patient record patient history . Reason believe treatment might negative effect patient 's total situation ( psychiatric problem ) , note patient record patient history . An exist condition acceptable retention restoration impossible attain Mobility tooth restore . Pathologic pocket formation 4 mm great around tooth restore . Severe bruxism destructive habit . Amount attach soft tissue insufficient ( attach gingiva buccal side tooth ) . Health condition , permit restorative procedure .
